meanings.sent1: The bureaucrats processed the paperwork efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The bureaucrats met to discuss new regulations.
meanings.sent3: The bureaucrats had a race to see who could stamp the most papers.
meanings.sent4: The office was a sea of bureaucrats, each with their own stack of forms.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bureaucrats typing away at their desks was like a well-oiled machine.

meanings.definition: An official in a government department.
meanings.sent1: The bureaucrats in the Ministry of Finance handled budget allocations.
meanings.sent2: The bureaucrats attended the meeting with the foreign diplomats.
meanings.sent3: The bureaucrats had a potluck lunch to boost office morale.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with bureaucrats, each with a different colored badge.
meanings.sent5: The bureaucrats in their suits and ties looked like a group of penguins waddling around.
